title: Other Languages[edit]
content:
There are a number of exciting new languages being created that also compile to Java byte code, such as Groovy.GNAT
The GNU Ada-Compiler, is capable of compiling Ada into Java-style bytecode.
ftp://cs.nyu.edu/pub/gnatJPython
Compiles Python to Java-style bytecode.
http://www.jpython.org/Kawa
Compiles Scheme to Java-style bytecode.
http://www.gnu.org/software/kawa/
